abstract: The New York Times, to me, has always manifested a masterful balance of innovation and tradition. So it’s exciting to be partnering with Matter Ventures for their inaugural Matter NYC class. We’re looking forward to learning from others and to sharing our own expertise.

headline.main: Why The New York Times is Working With Matter

snippet: The New York Times, to me, has always manifested a masterful balance of innovation and tradition. So it’s exciting to be partnering with Matter Ventures for their inaugural Matter NYC class. We’re looking forward to learning from others and to sharing our own expertise.
